sentence.Network_en: He refused to withdraw derogatory remarks made about his boss.
sentence.Network_cn: 他拒绝收回那些贬损老板的话。

sentence.Network_en: Such conduct will be derogatory to his reputation.
sentence.Network_cn: 那样的行为将会毁损他的名誉.

sentence.Network_en: He had drawn a derogatory statement from George.
sentence.Network_cn: 他已经逗出乔治一句毁贬的话.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (in the sense 'impairing in force or effect'): from late Latin derogatorius, from derogat- 'abrogated', from the verb derogare (see derogate)

entry.def: If you make a derogatory remark or comment about someone or something, you express your low opinion of them.

example.ex: He refused to withdraw derogatory remarks made about his boss.
example.tran: 他拒绝收回那些贬损老板的话。

auth_sentence.content: It is derogatory and almost glamorises things like that.

auth_sentence.content: Call them whatever derogatory word you prefer.

auth_sentence.content: Its a derogatory stereo-type usually flung out at the 'fringes'.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ar一再+rog要求,问+ant……的→一再要求的→傲慢的
derogate[v.贬低,诽谤]+ory……的→adj.不敬的,诽谤的
ar一再+rog要求,问+ance表名词→一再要的→arrogance傲慢
pre预先+rog要求+ative……的→预先要求→[有]特权
ab去掉+rog要求,问+ate表动词→不再要求有→取消掉
ar一再+rog要求+ate表动词→一再要求→硬是说
de向下,坏+rog要求,问+ate表动词→坏坏的问下去→贬低
inter在……中间+rog要求,问+ate表动词→在[审问室]中问→审问
pro前+rog要求,问+ue→提前问好[下次开会日期]→休会
sur下面+rog要求+ate使……→v.使代理, 使代替
